name: mega-launcher
description: A minimal Electron application written with Typescript

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=DEV cross-env PLATFORM=SILICON electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=PROD cross-env PLATFORM=SILICON electron ./dist/main.js
scripts.mac-silicon: tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=PROD cross-env PLATFORM=SILICON  electron-packager . --overwrite --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --prune=true --out=../silicon-builds --icon 'mac_icon'

author: GitHub
